note.p: Death: Court Hill, Haslemere, Surrey (30 November 1922)
Education: Edinburgh Academy; DSc (Edin); MB (1877, Edin); MD (1883, Edin)

Career: Was on the transit expedition to the island of Rodriquez (1874); Professor of Botany, Glasgow University (1879-1884); Sherardian Professor of Botany, Oxford University (1884-1888); Professor of Botany, Edinburgh University (1888-1921); Reguis Keeper of the Royal Botanic Garden, Edinburgh
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1924 vol 96 pp i-xvii, plate, signed by D P
